main.response_placeholder: Send a request to see the response here

previews.no_preview_available: No preview available for this content type.
previews.unsupported_preview: Preview for {{contentType}} is not supported yet.
previews.failed_to_load_base64: Failed to load preview from Base64 data.
previews.preview_blocked_description: For security reasons, this content cannot be displayed in an embedded window.

collections.title: Collections
collections.empty_description: Get started by creating a new collection.
collections.login_prompt_description: Your saved requests will appear here once you log in.
collections.create_dialog_description: Enter a name for your new collection to organize your requests.
collections.delete_collection_description: This will permanently delete the collection "{{name}}" and all requests inside it.
collections.delete_request_description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the request.

history.title: Request History
history.description: View and re-run your past 100 requests.
history.empty_description: Your recent requests will appear here.
history.empty_subdescription: Start by sending a request from the main window.
history.login_prompt_description: Request history is only available for logged in users.

environments.manage_description: Create, edit, and delete your environments and variables.
environments.delete_description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the environment and all its variables.
environments.login_prompt_description: Create and manage your environments after logging in.

save_dialog.title: Save Request
save_dialog.description: Save the current request to a collection for later use.

code_generator.dialog_description: Copy the code snippet for your current request configuration.

manage_shares.title: Manage Shared Requests
manage_shares.login_prompt_description: Your shared links will appear here once you log in.
manage_shares.empty_description: Create your first share from the main window.

toasts.validation_error_description: Please provide a request name and select a collection.
toasts.invalid_json_description: The request body contains invalid JSON and cannot be saved.
toasts.collection_full_description: A collection can hold a maximum of {{max}} requests.
toasts.share_error_description: Failed to generate a shareable link. Please try again.
toasts.share_limit_reached_description: You can only have {{max}} active shares. Please delete an old one.

share_page.no_response: No response was recorded for this share.
share_page.error_description: The shared request data seems to be corrupted or missing.
share_page.footer_text_end: a modern API client for developers.
